## New input1:
```java
    int year = 2020;
    int half = 2;
```
Explanation: This input is valid because the year is within the range of MIN_YEAR to MAX_YEAR (inclusive) and the half value is either 1 or 2.

## New input2:
```java
    int year = 2000;
    int half = 1;
```
Explanation: This input is valid because the year is within the range of MIN_YEAR to MAX_YEAR (inclusive) and the half value is either 1 or 2.
